title: [AUDIO]  Sound effects don't play on Snow fawn Poppy's recall
body: I know it's not a huge or gamebreaking bug, I thought it was just my game but when relogging the problem remained (yes I've double checked my sound settings)

replies.body: Hi Pényu! This isn't something occurring exclusively on your client. It's a known issue that we'll have a fix for in 8.8! Thanks for the report. <3
Thanks for the response, it's such a great skin so I'm glad it's getting fixed c:
speaking of sounds, the Star Guardian spawn music doesn't play, this needs a fix ASAP
